meanings.definition: To incorrectly enroll or register in a program or class.
meanings.sent1: She misenrolls in the advanced math course every semester.
meanings.sent2: He always misenrolls in classes that are too difficult for him.
meanings.sent3: The student's tendency to misenroll became a running joke among her friends.
meanings.sent4: Her habit of misenrolling in challenging courses was like signing up for a marathon without training.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of misenrolling can lead to unnecessary stress and frustration.

meanings.definition: The act of mistakenly enrolling or registering in a program or class.
meanings.sent1: His repeated misenrolls caused confusion in the school's registration system.
meanings.sent2: The misenrolls in the system were due to a technical error.
meanings.sent3: The misenrolls on his transcript made him the center of attention during orientation.
meanings.sent4: The misenrolls were discovered during the audit, causing a stir among the staff.
meanings.sent5: The student's collection of misenrolls was a reminder of the importance of double-checking registration forms.
